name: Basic Bowling Online Quiz | Sports Other | 10 Questions

questions.text: Which bowling ball company makes the 'Zone' series of bowling balls?

questions.text: What must a bowler average a game to shoot a 700 series in three games?

questions.text: Let's say that the first frame of a game you leave a 10-pin and you miss your spare, what would be the maximum score you would be able to bowl that certain game?

In an ABC sanctioned league or tournament, you bowl a horrible first game because the lanes are flooded with oil. An ABC rule allows you to alter the surface of your bowling ball with sandpaper to grip the lane better, even if you already bowled one game.
questions.explanation:
False.

	It is legal to sand or polish your bowling ball prior to a league or tournament, not after to start bowling the first game.

questions.text: If the lane conditions were extremely dry, which type of ball would be best for you to use?
It is legal for the ball to bounce out of the channel (gutter) and back on to the lane to knock down a pin or pins.
